data.text: Monna Awurade ase na oye;
Momma wɔn a Awurade agye wɔn nka saa,
wɔn a ɔboaboaa wɔn ano fii nsase so no,
Ebinom kyinkyinii wɔ nsase pradada so,
Ɔkɔm ne osukɔm dee wɔn
Afei wosu frɛɛ Awurade wɔ wɔn amanehunu mu,
Ɔde wɔn faa ɔkwan tee so
Momma wɔnna Awurade ase, nʼadɔe a ɛnsa da
ɔma wɔn a osukɔm de wɔn nsu
Ebinom tenaa sum ne awerɛhow mu,
efisɛ wɔatew Onyankopɔn nsɛm ho atua
Enti ogyaa wɔn maa adwumaden;
Afei wosu frɛɛ Awurade wɔ wɔn amanehunu mu,
Oyii wɔn fii sum ne awerɛhow mu,
Momma wɔnna Awurade ase, nʼadɔe a ɛnsa da
efisɛ obubu kɔbere mfrafra apon
Ebinom bɛyɛɛ nkwaseafo, wɔn atuatew nti,
Wokyii aduan nyinaa
Afei wosu frɛɛ Awurade, wɔn amanehunu mu
Ɔsomaa nʼasɛm na ɔsaa wɔn yare;
Momma wɔnna Awurade ase, nʼadɔe a ɛnsa da
Momma wɔmmɔ aseda afɔre
Ebinom tenaa ahyɛn mu wɔ po so;
Wohuu Awurade nnwuma,
Ɔkasa maa ahum tui
Wokukuru kɔɔ ɔsorosoro na wosian kɔɔ bun mu tɔnn;
Wokyim totɔɔ ntintan sɛ asabowfo;
Afei wosu frɛɛ Awurade, wɔn amanehunu mu,
Ɔmaa ahum no yɛɛ dinn;
Wɔn ani gyei, bere a ɛyɛɛ dinn no,
Momma wɔnna Awurade ase, nʼadɔe a ɛnsa da
Wɔmma no so wɔ asafo no mu
Ɔdan nsubɔnten maa no yɛɛ sare,
na asasebere dan nkyenenkyene,
Ɔdan sare so maa no yɛɛ nsuwansuwa
Ɛhɔ na ɔde wɔn a ɔkɔm de wɔn kɔsoɛe,
Wɔyɛɛ mfuw ne bobe nturo
Ohyiraa wɔn na wɔn ase dɔe.
Afei wɔn dodow so huanee
nea obu abirɛmpɔn animtiaa no
Nanso ɔmaa ahiafo so fii wɔn ahohia mu
Atreneefo hu ma wɔn ani gye,
Momma nea ɔyɛ onyansafo no mmu eyinom,
